OCD.name: Sum
OCD.description: A wire component that performs the sum of the values of two properties contained in two envelopes received on different ports.

AD.name: operand.name.1
AD.description: Specifies the name of the operand property in the envelope received on the first port.

AD.name: operand.name.2
AD.description: Specifies the name of the operand property in the envelope received on the second port.

AD.name: result.name
AD.description: Specifies the name of the result property in emitted envelope.

AD.name: barrier
AD.description: Specifies if the component should use a barrier for input ports or perform caching of messages
